name: Door Wizard
description:
Follow Handelle, a Door Wizard in training, on her adventure to becoming a fully-fledged Door Wizard!

Place down doors to get around and solve puzzles!

Collect keys to unlock new doors and Star Keys to progress to new realms!

Current Realms:  Magic School,  Tea Realm and Spooky  Realm with more to come!

This game is still currently in development!   Please be gentle with us, we know there are some bugs we have yet to squish.

It is currently playable on PC and Mac, and once complete will be made available for mobile.

THE TEAM:

  • PRODUCER: Annalise Valastro
  • PROGRAMMING, VFX: Ithing Prayitno, Annalise Valastro
  • 2D ART: Jianna Ngo
  • 3D  ENVIRONMENT ART: Hanaphi   Muhamadzen
  • 3D CHARACTER ART, ANIMATION:   Frey Holley Evans
